body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a hack driver (cabbie) in Louisville. Accused of theft of bed clothes in March of 1861. Served as a private in company H of the Second Kentucky Volunteer Infantry. After his discharge, he again found himself in trouble with the law and accused of theft.
